mapper.insert: insert all into member(mem_no,mem_id,mem_pw,mem_name,mem_birth,mem_state) values(seq_mem_no.nextval,#{mem_id},#{mem_pw},#{mem_name},#{mem_birth},0) into member_detail(mem_no,mem_email1,mem_email2,mem_join_date,mem_tel1,mem_tel2,mem_tel3,mem_zipcode1,mem_zipcode2,mem_address1,mem_address2) values(seq_mem_no.currval,#{mem_email1},#{mem_email2},sysdate,#{mem_tel1},#{mem_tel2},#{mem_tel3},#{mem_zipcode1},#{mem_zipcode2},#{mem_address1},#{mem_address2}) select * from dual

insert all into member(mem_no,mem_id,mem_name,mem_state,mem_pw) values(seq_mem_no.nextval,#{userid},#{username},0,#{userid}) into member_detail(mem_no,mem_email1,mem_email2,mem_join_date) values(seq_mem_no.currval,#{useremail1},#{useremail2},sysdate) select * from dual
mapper.update: update member m , member_detail d set mem_id = #{mem_id}, mem_pw = #{mem_pw}, mem_email1 = #{mem_email1}, mem_email2 = #{mem_email2}, mem_tel1=#{mem_tel1}, mem_tel2=#{mem_tel2}, mem_tel3=#{mem_tel3}, mem_zipcode1=#{mem_zipcode1},mem_zipcode2=#{mem_zipcode2}, mem_address1=#{mem_address1}, mem_address2=#{mem_address2} where m.mem_no = d.mem_no
